localizedContent.name: unlimited sms in Belgium and EU
unlimited sms in Belgium and EU
The very first Gigabit internet in Belgium is there. Ready to stream, download and play in flash. With 'n Giga Speedboost you can achieve top speeds of 1 Gigabit per second!

How do you achieve up to 1Gigabit per second?\nYou can achieve a top speed of up to 1Gbps or 1,000Mbps when you are connected to the modem via a network cable with a good computer (fast processor, no viruses, etc.) note that your top speed can be influenced by a number of factors.

The stated internet speeds are theoretical macium speeds when when a PC or laptop is connected to the modem with a cable. The actual internet speed can be influenced by traffic and other technical factors(such as wifi, internet cabling, processor,etc).However, the distance from the connection to the node does not affect the actual internet speed that you can achieve.
Do you often call abroad? Then the International Calling option is really for you. This gives you 2,000 minutes to call landline and mobile numbers abroad for € 10 per month.

To these EU countries: Austria, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, French Guiana, Germany, Gibraltar (UK), Greece, Guadeloupe, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Martinique, Mayotte, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Réunion, Romania, Saint-Barthélemy, Saint Martin, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom and Andorra.
And to Morocco, Turkey, the US, Canada, Democratic Republic of congo, Switzerland and Faroe Islands.
Via the Know-your-caller service,  you can  see the name and number of the caller on the screen of your device. The choice is yours: pick it up or just let it ring.

You expecting an important call on your landline, but you are away from home? Then, use the  call forwarding service and do not miss a call, ever. Using this you can forward calls to another (mobile) number where you can be reached. Even abroad.

You are already on the call and someone is trying to reach you on the same? Then you will hear a  signal indicating the 2nd call. You then have the choice: answer the call immediately, alternately talk to both conversation partners, or have the 2nd call forwarded to the Message Service. Handy, right?

Are you not at home or are you not able to record for a while? Fortunately, there is the  Telenet Message Service , an answering machine without a device, with your own personal message. Do you have a new voicemail message? Then you can see this on your landline telephone via a light, message or signal.
The Play Sports app and website en

With Telenet Wi-Free, as a Telenet internet customer you can also surf on the road via WiFi . This at more than 1.5 million locations in Flanders and Brussels . You register once, afterwards your device connects automatically if there is Wi-Free nearby.

With Telenet Wi-Free, as a Telenet internet customer you can also surf on the road via WiFi . This at more than 1.5 million locations in Flanders and Brussels . You register once, afterwards your device connects automatically if there is Wi-Free nearby.

Met Telenet Wi-Free u als Telenet internetklant ook onderweg surfen via WiFi. Dit op meer dan 1,5 miljoen locaties in Vlaanderen en Brussel. U registreert zich één keer, daarna maakt uw apparaat automatisch verbinding als er Wi-Free in de buurt is.
